name: ACTDO - IMS
description: Information Management System for Angeles City Traffic Development Office
projectSummary: This project is used as a template for the demonstration of the information management system of ACTDO as a Projects using the PHP native and Sql on Xampp to be clear there are no ACTDO valuable data exposed to upload this template.
aim: This software is to automate these processes and to improve the overall efficiency and clients experience of Office.
The system is easy to use and has user-friendly functionalities to help the employee's for their daily transactions.

technologiesUsed.frontEnd: HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Bootstrap for the user interface.
technologiesUsed.backEnd: PHP with the Xampp to handle application logic and APIs.
technologiesUsed.dataBase: MySQL to store user data, routines and queries to the virtual assistant.

frontEnd: Development of a clean and dynamic user dashboard for creating, editing, and viewing exercise routines.
Integration of interactive graphics to display physical progress.
backEnd: Implementation of endpoints for CRUD routines.
dataBase: Designing tables for users, exercises, and queries with normalized relationships.

name: Local Store - PIS
description: Product Inventory System for Local Store
projectSummary: This project is used as a template for the demonstration of the Product Inventory System of Local Store as a Projects using the C++ and MySql on WinForm.
aim: This software is to automate these processes and to improve the overall efficiency and clients experience of Office.
The system is easy to use and has user-friendly functionalities to help the employee's for their daily inventory.

technologiesUsed.backEnd: C++ to handle application logic and APIs.
technologiesUsed.dataBase: MySQL to store user data, routines.

frontEnd: Development of a clean and dynamic user for creating, editing, and viewing exercise routines.
Integration of interactive graphics to display physical progress.
backEnd: Implementation of endpoints for CRUD routines.
dataBase: Designing tables for users, exercises, and queries with normalized non-relationships.

name: RLCM
projectSummary: This personal project is used as a template for the demonstration of the Review Listing Content Management App of making blog, reviews, bussiness as i use the PHP, Vue3 and Sqlite database that use the framework Laravel for this simple personal project.
aim: This software is to automate these processes and to improve the overall efficiency and clients experience of Office.
The system is easy to use and has user-friendly functionalities to help the employee's for their daily inventory.

technologiesUsed.frontEnd: Vue and vite for the user interface.
technologiesUsed.backEnd: Php to handle application logic and APIs.
technologiesUsed.dataBase: Sqlite to store user data, routines.

frontEnd: Development of a clean and dynamic user for creating, editing, and viewing exercise routines.
Integration of interactive graphics to display physical progress.
backEnd: Implementation of endpoints for CRUD routines.
dataBase: Designing tables for users, exercises, and queries with normalized relationships.

name: RLMMC - IMS
projectSummary: This personal project is used as a template for the demonstration proposal design of the Rafael Lazatin Memorial Medical Center App of a hospital medical system as i use the C#, Guna UI and WinForm for this simple personal project.
aim: This software is to automate these processes and to improve the overall efficiency and medical staff experience of Office.
The system is easy to use and has user-friendly functionalities to help the employee's for their daily inventory.

technologiesUsed.frontEnd: Guna UI and WinForm for the user interface.
technologiesUsed.backEnd: C# to handle application logic and APIs.
technologiesUsed.dataBase: Not included in the proposal as per head management of the hospital.

frontEnd: Development of a clean and dynamic user for creating, editing, and viewing exercise routines.
Integration of interactive graphics to display physical progress.
backEnd: Implementation of endpoints for CRUD routines.
dataBase: Not included in the proposal as per head management of the hospital.
